sentences.en: Both he and the crew are on a steep learning curve.
sentences.cn: 他和组员们都学得很快。

sentences.en: Cabin crew have been giving evidence at the M1 aircrash enquiry.
sentences.cn: 机舱人员一直在为M1空难调查作证。

sentences.en: Her crew consisted of children from Devon and Cornwall.
sentences.cn: 她的团队由来自德文郡和康沃尔郡的孩子们组成。

sentences.en: Natasha attached herself to the film crew filming at her orphanage.
sentences.cn: 娜塔莎紧紧缠着在孤儿院拍摄电影的工作人员不放。

sentences.en: That night she, Nicholson and the crew had a celebratory dinner.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上，她、尼科尔森和全体工作人员吃了一顿庆功宴。

sentences.en: The airport ground crew tried to dissuade the pilot from taking off.
sentences.cn: 机场地勤人员试图阻止这位飞行员驾机起飞。

sentences.en: The crew fought a losing battle to try to restart the engines.
sentences.cn: 全体船员努力尝试重新启动发动机，但结果徒劳无功。

sentences.en: The crew of the Iowa has been preparing the ship for storage.
sentences.cn: “艾奥瓦号”的船员一直都在为货物储存准备船只。

sentences.en: The crew of the ship gave them nothing but bread to eat.
sentences.cn: 船上的工作人员除了面包什么也不给他们吃。

sentences.en: The crew of the trawler were gathered below decks.
sentences.cn: 托网渔船上的船员被聚集到甲板下。

sentences.en: The crew spent two days and nights in their raft.
sentences.cn: 船员在救生筏上呆了两天两夜。

sentences.en: The nine crew on the Boeing 747 were released unharmed.
sentences.cn: 那架波音747上的9名机组成员平安获释。

sentences.en: The officers and crew prepared to abandon ship in an orderly fashion.
sentences.cn: 全体船员秩序井然地准备弃船。

sentences.en: The plane crashed, killing two of the crew and four passengers.
sentences.cn: 飞机坠毁，造成两名机组人员和四名乘客死亡。

sentences.en: The ship went under, taking with her all her crew.
sentences.cn: 轮船连同其所有的船员一起沉没了。

sentences.en: The ship's crew were now exhausted and utterly demoralized.
sentences.cn: 这艘船上的船员现在都已精疲力竭，彻底丧失了信心。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 电影（或电视）摄制组
机组人员；飞行人员；空勤人员

trans.tran_cn: (飞机、轮船等上的)全体工作人员，技术团队，一组人，划船队，赛船运动
trans.tran_en: all the people who work on a ship or plane
